title: Career Guidance
description: This blog guides your career guidance journey.

quiz.question: What is the first step in identifying your interests and strengths for a tech career?
Which of the following is a key skill for a career in software development?
What does a data scientist primarily focus on?
options: B) Protecting systems from cyber threats

quiz.question: Which key skill is essential for a career in cybersecurity?
What is a primary responsibility of someone in UX/UI design?
Which skill is crucial for IT support and administration?
What should you focus on to stay updated with the latest technologies and industry trends?
How can you build a professional network in the tech industry?
options: A) Attending industry events and joining online communities
B) Working in isolation on personal projects
quiz._answer: A) Attending industry events and joining online communities

quiz.question: Which activity helps gain hands-on experience in tech?
What can help you advance to advanced roles in your tech career?
options: A) Acquiring specialized skills and gaining leadership experience
C) Focusing solely on entry-level tasks
quiz._answer: A) Acquiring specialized skills and gaining leadership experience
